text: and what we do have is apparently a
confirmation from the Ukrainian
government from a official in the
Interior Ministry confirming through the
Interfax news agency locally that the
plane did crash now of course we don't
know the circumstances there are any
number of possibilities here but it
should be said that it did crash in the
eastern part of the country where this
ongoing conflict has been taking place
between Ukrainian government forces and
the pro-russian rebels and and Russian
citizens among the rebels also this is
an area that has seen a number of
shootings down of aircraft helicopters
as well as a transport plane just
recently which the Ukrainians blamed on
on Russians they said that there was a
missile from Russian territory the
russians deny this but obviously this is
taking place in an area with ongoing
ongoing conflict and amidst rising
tensions between Russia and Ukraine
